neighbors.name: Brianna & Shawn Secrest
neighbors.claims: Brianna and Shawn Secrest are listed as the owners of the property located at 25271 W Parkside Ln S in Buckeye, Maricopa County ([LoopNet](https://www.loopnet.com/property/25271-w-parkside-ln-s-buckeye-az-85326/04013-40035010/)). Shawn Secrest has a documented history in motocross racing, dating back to 1988 in Arizona ([Cycle News](https://archive.org/stream/cycle-news-1988-04-27/cycle-news-1988-04-27_djvu.txt)). No recent involvement in local government committees, civic groups, or development hearings was found in public records.
neighbors.influence_justification: No public roles or recent civic activity identified

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a personal, trust-building outreach. A project representative should meet the Secrests one-on-one to listen to any concerns and emphasize measures that protect their property value and lifestyle.

citations.claim: Brianna and Shawn Secrest are listed as the owners of the property located at 25271 W Parkside Ln S in Buckeye, Maricopa County
citations.title: 25271 W Parkside Ln S, Buckeye, AZ 85326

citations.claim: Shawn Secrest has a documented history in motocross racing, dating back to 1988 in Arizona
citations.title: Cycle News 1988-04-27

neighbors.name: Maria & Jaime Javier Covarrubias
neighbors.claims: Maria and Jaime Javier Covarrubias are associated with the property at 9125 S 253rd Ave in Buckeye, which was built in 2018 ([LoopNet](https://www.loopnet.com/property/9125-s-253rd-ave-buckeye-az-85326/04013-40035397/)). Maria Covarrubias has participated in local community support programs, specifically sharing her experiences with the "First Things First" early childhood development program in the Southwest Maricopa Region regarding school readiness ([First Things First](https://www.firstthingsfirst.org/region-stories/developmental-screening-program-helps-get-avondale-preschooler-ready-kindergarten/)). There is no evidence in local meeting minutes that they have taken a public stance on energy projects.
neighbors.influence_justification: Participates in local family support programs; no policy influence

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in a respectful, informal setting. Given Maria's engagement with family support programs, highlight community benefits that support local schools and families to help the Covarrubias family feel informed.

citations.claim: Maria and Jaime Javier Covarrubias are associated with the property at 9125 S 253rd Ave in Buckeye, which was built in 2018
citations.title: 9125 S 253Rd Ave, Buckeye, AZ 85326 - APN 400-35-397

citations.claim: Maria Covarrubias has participated in local community support programs, specifically sharing her experiences with the "First Things First" early childhood development program
citations.title: Developmental screening program helps get Avondale preschooler ready for kindergarten

neighbors.name: Raul & Bertha G. Andrade
neighbors.claims: Raul and Bertha G. Andrade are landowners recorded at 25247 W Parkside Ln S in Buckeye, AZ ([LoopNet](https://www.loopnet.com/property/25247-w-parkside-ln-s-buckeye-az-85326/04013-40035007/)). Public records confirm Bertha G. Andrade's residency at this location ([NPD](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/a/bertha-andrade/)). The family appears connected to the local Odyssey Institute, where a Raul Andrade is listed as a student-athlete ([Hudl](https://www.hudl.com/profile/16278997/Raul-andrade/about)). There is no evidence in local news archives or public hearings that the homeowners have taken a stance on energy or development projects.
neighbors.influence_justification: Active in local school community; no political office

approach_recommendations.engage: Meet with the Andrade family in person. Acknowledge their ties to the local school community (Odyssey Institute) and emphasize open communication regarding safety and property values.
